title: Torawareta Amai Kemono-tachi
sinopse:
Kazuki, the heir to the Todou Group, goes alone to America to learn in earnest to be the next president, upon graduating from college.

How is Chiharu Saijou, that has been together forever with him as his tutor and as his lover for 12 years, supposed to let go of Kazuki...!?
